ItemDesc: Upon use, Max HP of all allies increases by <unbreak>14%</unbreak> plus an extra <unbreak>360</unbreak> for the next battle.
ItemBGDesc: This burger earns its name from the crunchy disc-shaped flaky chip nestled between the buns, and only a few individuals can consume it in a dignified way. In certain taverns, devouring a Floatdisc Burger without using your hands has become somewhat of a legendary challenge.\n\n"Why is it that some Halovians always find fault with its appearance?"
